mil5.3.4:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, bhasitampetam therena sariputtena dhammasenapatina parisuddhavacisamacaro avuso tathagato, natthi tathagatassa vaciduccaritam, yam tathagato rakkheyya ‘ma me idam paro annasi’ti.
mil5.3.4:1.2: Puna ca tathagato therassa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparadhe parajikam pannapento pharusahi vacahi moghapurisavadena samudacari, tena ca so thero moghapurisavadena mankucittavasena rundhitatta vippatisari nasakkhi ariyamaggam pativijjhitum.
mil5.3.4:1.3: Yadi, bhante nagasena, parisuddhavacisamacaro tathagato, natthi tathagatassa vaciduccaritam, tena hi tathagatena therassa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparadhe moghapurisavadena samudacinnanti yam vacanam, tam miccha.
mil5.3.4:1.4: Yadi bhagavata therassa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparadhe moghapurisavadena samudacinnam, tena hi parisuddhavacisamacaro tathagato, natthi tathagatassa vaciduccaritanti tampi vacanam miccha.
mil5.3.4:1.5: Ayampi ubhato kotiko panho tavanuppatto, so taya nibbahitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.4:2.2: ‘parisuddhavacisamacaro avuso tathagato, natthi tathagatassa vaciduccaritam, yam tathagato rakkheyya “ma me idam paro annasi”’ti.
mil5.3.4:2.3: Ayasmato ca sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparadhe parajikam pannapentena bhagavata moghapurisavadena samudacinnam, tanca pana adutthacittena asarambhena yathavalakkhanena.
mil5.3.4:2.4: Kinca tattha yathavalakkhanam, yassa, maharaja, puggalassa imasmim attabhave catusaccabhisamayo na hoti, tassa purisattanam mogham annam kayiramanam annena sambhavati, tena vuccati ‘moghapuriso’ti.
mil5.3.4:2.5: Iti, maharaja, bhagavata ayasmato sudinnassa kalandaputtassa sabhavavacanena samudacinnam, no abhutavadena”ti.
mil5.3.4:3.1: “Sabhavampi, bhante nagasena, yo akkosanto bhanati, tassa mayam kahapanam dandam dharema, aparadhoyeva so vatthum nissaya visum voharam acaranto akkosati”ti.
mil5.3.4:3.2: “Atthi pana, maharaja, sutapubbam taya khalitassa abhivadanam va paccutthanam va sakkaram va upayananuppadanam va”ti?
mil5.3.4:3.3: “Na hi, bhante, yato kutoci yattha katthaci khalito, so paribhasanaraho hoti tajjanaraho, uttamangampissa chindanti hanantipi bandhantipi ghatentipi jhapentipi”ti.
mil5.3.4:3.4: “Tena hi, maharaja, bhagavata kiriyayeva kata, no akiriya”ti.
mil5.3.4:4.1: “Kiriyampi, bhante nagasena, kurumanena patirupena katabbam anucchavikena, savanenapi, bhante nagasena, tathagatassa sadevako loko ottappati hiriyati bhiyyo dassanena tatuttarim upasankamanena payirupasanena”ti.
mil5.3.4:4.2: “Api nu kho, maharaja, tikicchako abhisanne kaye kupite dose sinehaniyani bhesajjani deti”ti?
mil5.3.4:4.3: “Na hi, bhante, tinhani lekhaniyani bhesajjani deti”ti.
mil5.3.4:4.4: “Evameva kho, maharaja, tathagato sabbakilesabyadhivupasamaya anusitthim deti, pharusapi, maharaja, tathagatassa vaca satte sinehayati, muduke karoti.
mil5.3.4:4.5: Yatha, maharaja, unhampi udakam yam kinci sinehaniyam sinehayati, mudukam karoti;
mil5.3.4:4.6: evameva kho, maharaja, pharusapi tathagatassa vaca atthavati hoti karunasahagata.
mil5.3.4:4.7: Yatha, maharaja, pituvacanam puttanam atthavantam hoti karunasahagatam;
mil5.3.4:4.8: evameva kho, maharaja, pharusapi tathagatassa vaca atthavati hoti karunasahagata.
mil5.3.4:4.9: Pharusapi, maharaja, tathagatassa vaca sattanam kilesappahana hoti.
mil5.3.4:4.10: Yatha, maharaja, duggandhampi gomuttam pitam virasampi agadam khayitam sattanam byadhim hanati;
mil5.3.4:4.11: evameva kho, maharaja, pharusapi tathagatassa vaca atthavati karunasahagata.
mil5.3.4:4.12: Yatha, maharaja, mahantopi tulapunjo parassa kaye nipatitva rujam na karoti;
mil5.3.4:4.13: evameva kho, maharaja, pharusapi tathagatassa vaca na kassaci dukkham uppadeti”ti.
mil5.3.4:4.15: Sadhu, bhante nagasena, evametam tatha sampaticchami”ti.
